text: Giant Spiders are deadly hunters, easily capable of ensnaring and overwhelming a fully-grown man.
When fully grown, these Gigantic Spiders are prized as revered mounts for a Goblin tribe's mightiest warriors.
The Forest Goblins worship the Spiders as Gods of the Forest.
A belligerent threat to all lumbering communities, the Forest Goblins often compete with other forest-dwelling races for territorial supremacy.
